籤詩版本二:
Iintaka ezidla inyama zijika zibe ngama-pengs ekwindla, ziyavuya xa zihamba kwaye zibhabha
Ukubhabha kumawaka eekhilomitha esibhakabhakeni, zonke ezinye iintaka azikwazi
詩意:
Le hexagram luphawu lokuhla nokunyuka kukaKunpeng.
Yonke into iyatshintsha.
解曰: IKun iguqulwe yaba yiPeng. Amawaka eentaka akanako. Ipinki yesinamoni. Ubutyebi nobutyebi buya kwanda.
籤詩故事一:
◇UHan Xin ulawula
UHan Xin wayevela eHuaiyin.
Ngelo xesha, uKumkani waseHan wayitshisa iplanga yendlela, kwaye amaninzi amajoni akhe asaba.UHan Xin, owayezimele kuKumkani waseHan, naye wabaleka.
U-Xiao Wafumanisa kwaye wamgxotha uHan Xin emva kobusuku.
Ngosuku olulandelayo xa uKumkani waseHan wakuva oku, ngomsindo wathi: “Phantse isiqingatha samajoni sabaleka. Andizange ndive ukuba nileqa ezinye iinkulumbuso, kodwa nileqa uHan Xin wedwa. Ngoba?
U-Xiao Wathi: "Ukuba i-Majesty yakho ayinayo injongo yokunqoba u-Xiang Yu, yilibale. Ukuba ufuna ukukhuphisana noChu ngenxa yehlabathi, kufuneka ube no-Han Xin. " UKumkani waseHan wanqula uHan Xin njengesiqhelo.
UHan Xin ke wancedisa uMlawuli uGao waseHan ukuba alawule ihlabathi, wathimba ukumkani waseWei, wamoyisa uZhao, wanikezela kuYan, wambamba uQi, wamtshabalalisa uChu. Wenza iimpumelelo ezilishumi ezinkulu kwaye kuqala wanikwa iwonga lokuba nguKumkani weChu.
聖意: Ithamsanqa lekhaya, ithamsanqa kuwe, ithamsanqa ekwindla, ishishini elihle, umtshato kade, amashwa eLiujia, abantu bavimba amasimi, imisundululu, ukucaba, ithamsanqa kwizilwanyana ezithandathu, ithamsanqa entwasahlobo, ulahlekile. abantu, amatyala, impumelelo, ukufuduka, ukugcinwa, ukulahleka kwempahla, izifo, ukuthandazela uxolo ezintabeni nasemangcwabeni
